title: What comic character are you?
description: Picture yourself in ink with this cool quiz!
question: Which statement best describes you?

answers.label: I have a slingshot and I'm not afraid to use it.
Some might say I have an overative imagination.
Long naps and sanwiches are kinda my thing.  Getting to work on time is not.
My dog might be plotting to take over corporate America.
Premature balding is the least of my worries.
There's no time for bathing when there's sacking and looting to be done!

responses.name: Charlie Brown
responses.description: Not many people can pull of being neurotic and affable.  Now if you could just kick that football...

responses.name: Dennis the Menace
responses.description: Neighbors beware! Even if you land in the time out chair, you still do things your way.

responses.name: Hagar the Horrible
responses.description: The only bathing you need is bathing your thirst with a cup of grog.

responses.name: Dagwood Bumstead
responses.description: You're a culinary legend who's more focused on enjoying life than paying attention to the clock. Now if you could just stop crashing into the mailman.

responses.name: Dilbert
responses.description: Facepalms are your speciality thanks to pointy haired boss.

responses.name: Garfield
responses.description: Life is rough without sleep and lasagna.

responses.name: Calvin
responses.description: You see the world with a tiger's eyes. Now if only everyone else could.
